changelist.name: Default
changelist.comment: Warnings about exceptions or invalid attempts by user specified.

task.summary: Warnings about exceptions or invalid attempts by user specified.

Refactoring Product. New attribute defined product class. If the product may sell by itself then user must define its price! (like cola or desert)Those products will be brought into the add order screen
update and delete product error/confirmation diaglog
show ingredients of ordered item in addOrder button screen
addOrder check if the table's cheque contains that menu then sum their quantities with existing ones
